Enumeration Type Documentation

enum EagleDataType

Data types for pages.

Enumerator:
EagleDataTypeUnknown 

Unknown/invalid data type.

EagleDataTypeInteger 

INT or INTEGER: 32bit integer.

EagleDataTypeVarchar 

VARCHAR: A NULL terminated string.

EagleDataTypeFloat 

FLOAT: 64bit floating point.

Function Documentation

EagleDataType EagleDataType_nameToType ( char *  name  ) 

Convert a type name to its enum value.

This function is not case-sensitive.

Parameters:
[in] name The name of the type.
Returns:
EagleDataTypeUnknown if the type is unknown. Otherwise the correct enum value for the type.
See also:
EagleDataType

00006     if(!strcasecmp(name, "int") || !strcasecmp(name, "integer")) {
00007         return EagleDataTypeInteger;
